channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report E-2025010367
item.description:
Report E-2025010367

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-10T06:19:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-18
  • City: DUANESBURG
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: L.P. TRANSPORTATION, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Driver stated he had finished unloading, closed all valves including the trailer's internal valve and disconnected the unloading hose. While attempting to replace the protective cap on the outlet fitting, the Driver states he either slipped and reached out for something(valve) to "catch " himself or the cap's safety chain(cable) became draped over the valve handle and when he pulled the cap the valve opened slightly. Residual product exited the outlet contacting the driver in the mid section. There was no failure of packaging, valves or equipment.
